Name: 我的赛车生涯/My Racing Career
About the game: This is a Simulation Management Game,Game player will play as a street racer in the game, only rely on their own ability and cleverness and a dilapidated second-hand car, from nothing to fame and fortune. 1,Story You are an unemployed youth in the game, You are young,and you pursue your own dreams, because you love racing since childhood, so you disregard the objections of the family, become a street racer, and determined to use your superb drive skills to fan the living beings! 2,Operation This game controls the way the car is different from other racing games, this game uses the mouse to click the button way to operate the car, and the player can make the lens follow own car also can control the lens movement freely. 3,Opportunities In the game, almost every day will encounter new opportunities, through different players choose, will get very different results, and even some options will have far-reaching impact ... Therefore, this game is like your life, only the correct grasp of opportunities will be successful! 4,Upgrade your car As the game progresses, player will encounter more and more powerful opponents, so you need to do everything possible to upgrade your car! However, still want to remind everyone: Please choose wisely upgrade! 5,Access toequipment and free modification In the game, the player has a variety of access to equipment, can be purchased, but also through the game in the 'scavenging' function to obtain, each piece of equipment have different functions and functions, players need to try how to apply them reasonably. 6,Repair your car The player's car needs regular maintenance, many times to participate in the game without maintenance will lead to car trouble! 7,Hidden items There are many hidden items in the game,the player may need to play many times to discover.
